description: This requirement is for: House of Commons (HoC).
full_summary:
# Intensive Official Language Training

### Request for Proposal

The Chambre des communes (HoC) invites prospective Service Providers to submit proposals for the provision of Intensive Official Language Training Services for Members of Parliament (MPs) across Canada.

### Description

This request for proposals is an invitation to prospective Service Providers to submit proposals for the provision of Intensive Language Training Services for Members of Parliament located across Canada. These services are designed to enhance the language skills of MPs in both English and French languages.

### Request for Proposal Details

*   Reference Number: `cb-101-37468450`
*   Solicitation Number: `2023072`
*   Date of Publication: April 19, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: May 21, 2024 at 14:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   UNSPSC Code: `86120000` (Educational Institutions)
*   Procurement Category: SRV
*   Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Contact Information

Kaouthar Gherairi
Senior Contracting Officer
